name: Reflexive Barrier
text: In the blink of an eye, you erect a deflective barrier of force to protect one target. The target gains a deflection bonus to its AC equal to half your caster level. This bonus lasts until the beginning of your next turn. You can cast this spell as a reaction to an attack, but you must do so before the result of the attack is revealed.
text_zh: 通过眨一只眼睛，你创造了一个偏折攻击的力场护壁来保护一个目标。目标在AC上获得等于你的施法者等级一半的偏斜加值。这个加值持续到你的下一轮开始。你可以作为对一次攻击的反应施放该法术，但是你必须在攻击检定结果揭示之前使用。
